application.name: iContact
application.description:
iContact
A new implementation of iContact by supbro building on the source code release by Larna, with aditional features including Full screen, and a top bar based on A_Cs S2 series.

Check http://www.supware.net/iContact for more info!

Release Notes:

0.76 - July 26, 2008
  • Added VGA Compatiblity!
  • Added company phone number (also added "company" to language file)
  • Now allows you to de-favorite a favorite from within the favorites details screen
  • Now allows you to click the keyboard popup from favorites or call details: will switch to all contacts first.
  • Fixed bug with newly favorited contacts not showing up as favorite in contacts list
  • Added wait cursor feedback for operations taking a long time
  • Added command line arguments: -favorites , -recents , -contacts , -dialer , -search
  • Removed "CategoriesField" from language, it's no longer needed
  • Added "Save to Contacts" in call log details screen (thanks [getlist]!)
